SELECT MIN(an.name) AS acress_pseudonym,
       MIN(t.title) AS japanese_anime_movie
FROM aka_name AS an,
     cast_info AS ci,
     company_name AS cn,
     movie_companies AS mc,
     name AS n,
     role_type AS rt,
     title AS t
WHERE an.person_id = n.id
  AND n.id = ci.person_id
  AND ci.movie_id = t.id
  AND t.id = mc.movie_id
  AND mc.company_id = cn.id
  AND ci.role_id = rt.id
  AND an.person_id = ci.person_id
  AND mc.note LIKE '%(Japan)%'
  AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(USA)%'
  AND (mc.note LIKE '%(2006)%'
       OR mc.note LIKE '%(2007)%')
  AND n.name LIKE '%Yo%'
  AND n.name NOT LIKE '%Yu%'
  AND cn.country_code ='[jp]'
  AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id
  AND rt.role = 'miscellaneous crew'
AND t.title like 'The%'
AND ci.note = '(production coordinator: Studio) (uncredited)'
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 2002  AND 2007;
